optionFields.name: typeSpeed
optionFields.label: Type Speed
optionFields.instructions: How fast should we type? (lower is faster, including negative values)

optionFields.name: startDelay
optionFields.label: Start Delay
optionFields.instructions: How long should we wait before starting to type? (in milliseconds)

optionFields.name: backSpeed
optionFields.label: Back Speed
optionFields.instructions: How fast should we backspace? (lower is faster, including negative values)

optionFields.name: backDelay
optionFields.label: Back Delay
optionFields.instructions: How long should we wait before starting to backspace? (in milliseconds)

optionFields.name: loopCount
optionFields.label: Loop Count
optionFields.instructions: How many times should we loop?

optionFields.name: showCursor
optionFields.label: Show Cursor
optionFields.instructions: Do we want to display a cursor?
